com.arangodb.springframework.config

Interface ArangoConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractArangoConfiguration

    public interface ArangoConfiguration
    Defines methods to customize the Java-based configuration for Spring Data ArangoDB.
    Author:
    Mark Vollmary
